alert.note: Alert for Breckinridge; Meade (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Meade and central Breckinridge Counties through 415 PM EDT/315 PM CDT/... At 359 PM EDT/259 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northeast of Hardinsburg, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Meade and central Breckinridge Counties, including the following locations... Guston, Mystic, Raymond, Frymire, Irvington, Graysville, Clifton Mills, Haysville, Webster and Ekron. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM EDT/600 PM CDT/ for central Kentucky.
